name: Version Control System
description: Satoshi Energy Corp uses a version control system to manage source code, change documentation and tracking, release labeling, and other change management tasks. Access to the version control system is restricted to authorized personnel.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of the version control system configured, with controls enabled.

name: Change Review Process
description: Changes are peer-reviewed and approved prior to deployment by an individual different from the developer to maintain segregation of duties. Review requirements are enforced through automated mechanisms such as branch protection settings in the production code repository.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of the branch protection settings for relevant code repositories used in production. Example: Screenshots showing configured rules and the repository they pertain to. If your organization configures repositories ruleset at the organization level, upload evidence of those global configurations.

name: Production Changes Restricted
description: Access to make changes in production environments is restricted to authorized personnel in accordance with segregation of duties principles and the company's documented policies and procedures.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing users with access to deploy changes to production. Example: Users with administrator access to a production server, users that can trigger deployments in CI/CD tools, code owners in the production repositories.

name: Separate Environments
description: Pre-production environments (e.g., development, testing, etc.) are separated from production environments and the separation is enforced with access controls.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing separate environments exist for development, testing, staging, and production as applicable. Example: Screenshots of the web environments showing different URLs, screenshots showing separate infrastructure such as different servers, databases, networks for production and lower environments.

name: External Communication Channels
description: Satoshi Energy Corp provides external communication mechanisms for customers and third parties (e.g., communication features, support portal, external ticketing system, etc.) to report complaints, failures, bugs, incidents, vulnerabilities, requests for information, etc. Customer communications are responded to within defined SLAs.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of communication channels available to customers to report issues, bugs, suspected incidents, etc. Example: Screenshots of customer support portal, help desk page, embedded communication features in web application.

name: Internal Communication Channels
description: Internal communication channels are in place for employees to report failures, events, incidents, policy violations, concerns, and other issues to company management, including anonymous reporting channels if applicable.
example_evidence: Upload examples of internal communication channels for employees to report failures, events, incidents, concerns, and other issues. Example: Screenshot of internal channels dedicated to security event reporting in messaging apps (Slack, MS Teams, etc.), whistleblower channels.

name: Access Control Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has developed and documented a policy that outlines requirements for access control.
example_evidence: Upload your documented access control policy.

name: Periodic Access Reviews
description: Management performs user access reviews periodically (as defined by policy and compliance requirements) to validate user accounts, including third party or vendor accounts, and their associated privileges remain appropriate.
example_evidence: Upload documentation of the most recent user access and permissions review. Example: Screenshots of the user lists and permissions reviewed, evidence of sign-offs or approvals by at least two individuals (SOD), documentation of changes requested if any, and evidence that the changes requested were implemented. Auditors will generally require to see the following: Evidence of the review inputs, Evidence that segregation of duties was maintained, Changes identified were implemented.

name: Baseline Configuration and Hardening Standards
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has identified and documented baseline security configuration standards for all system components in accordance with industry-accepted hardening standards or vendor recommendations.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of your documented baseline security configuration and hardening standards. Examples of industry-accepted baseline security configurations include: CIS Benchmarks, CIS Hardened Images, NIST Security Configuration Checklists.

name: Information Security Policies
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has defined and documented an information security policy and other topic-specific policies as needed to support the functioning of internal control.
example_evidence: Upload your documented information security policies and topic-specific policies.

name: Organizational Chart
description: An organizational chart is in place to describe the organizational structure and reporting lines. The chart is available to all employees (e.g., through the company's HRMS, intranets, etc.) and is updated upon changes to the organizational structure.
example_evidence: Upload your current organizational chart (e.g., screenshot or export from HRMS showing personnel, their job title, department, reporting lines, etc).

name: Risk Assessment Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has defined and documented a process for risk assessment and risk management that outlines the organization's approach for identifying risks and assigning risk owners, the risk acceptance criteria, and the approach for evaluating and treating risks based on the defined criteria.
example_evidence: Upload your documented risk assessment and risk management policy.

name: Periodic Risk Assessment
description: Satoshi Energy Corp conducts risks assessments periodically as required by company policy and compliance requirements. The risk assessment includes consideration of threats and vulnerabilities and an evaluation of the likelihood and impact for each risk.
example_evidence: Upload documentation of the most recent risk assessment activities performed (e.g., risk register, risk treatment plan) in accordance with company policies and compliance requirements.

name: Risk Treatment Plan
description: Satoshi Energy Corp's management has documented a risk treatment plan to formally manage risks identified in risk assessment activities.
example_evidence: Upload your documented risk treatment plan with identified risks and mitigation strategies.

name: Vulnerability Scans
description: Satoshi Energy Corp conducts vulnerability scans of the production environment as dictated by company policy and compliance requirements. Results are reviewed by company personnel and vulnerabilities are tracked to resolution in accordance with company policies.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of vulnerability scanning activities. Example: Vulnerability scan reports showing scope and results, evidence of internal tracking and remediation of findings.

name: Penetration Tests
description: An external penetration test of production environments is performed by an independent third party periodically or after any significant infrastructure or application changes. Results are reviewed by management and vulnerabilities are tracked to resolution in accordance with company policies.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of the most recent penetration testing activities. Example: Report(s) of the most recent penetration test(s) performed by a third-party or internal resource showing scope and results, evidence of the internal tracking and remediation of findings (internal tickets, change documentation).

name: Asset Inventory
description: A centralized asset register is maintained for physical, cloud, and other assets that includes descriptive attributes for asset accountability such as owner, description, location, classification, and/or other information based on the type of asset.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of: 1. Formal, documented listing of all assets (workstations, mobile devices, servers, databases, etc.). 2. For cloud infrastructure, screenshots from cloud environments listing all infrastructure.

name: Architectural Diagram
description: A documented architectural diagram is in place to document system boundaries and support the functioning of internal control. The diagram is reviewed and approved by management at least annually and updated as necessary when there are changes to the environment.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of your current architecture diagram(s) and evidence of updates/reviews within the past year for accuracy (e.g., emails from responsible personnel confirming the accuracy and completeness of the architecture diagram(s), etc.).

name: Network Diagram
description: A documented network diagram is in place to document system boundaries and connections to external networks. The diagram is reviewed and approved by management at least annually and updated as necessary when there are changes to the environment.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of your current network diagram(s) and evidence of updates/reviews within the past year for accuracy.

name: Disaster Recovery Plan
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has a documented disaster recovery plan that outlines roles, responsibilities and detailed procedures for recovery of systems in the event of a disaster scenario.
example_evidence: Upload your documented disaster recovery plan that outlines roles, responsibilities and detailed procedures for recovery of systems in the event of a disaster scenario.

name: BCP/DR Tests
description: Satoshi Energy Corp conducts tests of the business continuity/disaster recovery plans at least annually. Results and lessons learned are documented, and updates to the plans are made as necessary.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of your most recent business continuity and/or disaster recovery test. Example: Documentation of the activities performed, results, and lessons learned, calendar invites showing participants and dates.

name: Cloud Resources Availability
description: Business-critical cloud resources are deployed in accordance with high availability architecture principles (e.g., replicated across multiple availability zones or regions, configured for high-availability, etc.).
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing business-critical cloud resources are deployed in accordance with high availability architecture principles.

name: Security Events Tracked and Evaluated
description: Satoshi Energy Corp evaluates security events to determine if they constitute an incident. Incidents are assigned a priority, categorized, documented, tracked, escalated, contained, eradicated, communicated, and resolved in accordance with company policies and procedures.
example_evidence: For an example security event deemed an incident, upload the incident documentation including evidence of internal tracking (e.g., internal ticket), root-cause analysis (RCA)/post-mortem, lessons learned.

name: Incident Response Team
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has identified and documented roles and responsibilities for incident management (e.g., roles and responsibilities for invoking the incident management process, incident leads, incident handlers, communication coordinators, technical advisors, legal advisors, etc.).
example_evidence: Upload evidence of your documented roles and responsibilities for incident response. Example: Documentation of your internal incident response processes and procedures outlining the roles and responsibilities for incident management such as: Incident managers, Incident handlers, Communication coordinators, Advisors.

name: Incident Response Lessons Learned Documented
description: Satoshi Energy Corp documents a post-mortem review for identified incidents that includes incident metadata, root-cause analysis, documentation of evidence, summary of containment, eradication, and recovery actions, timelines, incident metrics, evidence of internal and external communications, estimation of impact and scope, and lessons learned, as applicable, in accordance with company policies and procedures.
example_evidence: Upload documentation showing post-incident reviews are conducted with lessons learned documented and changes implemented.

name: Software Development Policies
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has developed policies and procedures governing the system development life cycle, including requirements, design, implementation, testing, and deployment.
example_evidence: Upload your documented software development life cycle policies and procedures.

name: Security Policies
description: Company policies are accessible to all employees and, as applicable, third parties such as contractors. Personnel are required to acknowledge the information security policy and other topic-specific policies based on their job duties during onboarding and annually thereafter.
example_evidence: Upload evidence that company policies are accessible to all employees and that personnel acknowledge policies during onboarding and annually.

name: Periodic Policy Reviews
description: Management reviews and approves company policies at least annually. Updates to the policies are made as deemed necessary (e.g., based on changes to business objectives, legal or regulatory requirements, organizational risks, etc.).
example_evidence: Upload evidence of management's review and approval of policies at least annually with documentation of any updates made.

name: Periodic Security Training
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has established training programs to help personnel gain awareness of information security best practices. Personnel (including employees and contractors as applicable) are required to complete the training during onboarding. Periodic refresher training is provided to personnel at least annually and as deemed necessary.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that a training program related to information security has been implemented (e.g., records of training materials, screenshots of training content, records of completion for personnel).

name: Acceptable Use Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has a documented acceptable use policy that outlines requirements for personnel's usage of company assets.
example_evidence: Upload your documented acceptable use policy.

name: Performance Evaluations
description: Management conducts periodic evaluations of performance against established goals and objectives for eligible personnel in accordance with company policies and procedures.
example_evidence: Upload an example of a completed performance evaluation for a member of personnel performed within the past year showing components of the evaluation process (e.g., self-reviews, peer-reviews, manager-reviews, etc.). Consider redacting information that may be considered sensitive.

name: Background Checks
description: Background checks are conducted on eligible personnel (employees and third parties as deemed necessary by the organization) prior to hire as permitted by local laws.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of background checks conducted on personnel prior to hire.

name: Independent Board of Directors
description: The board of directors includes members independent from management who are not involved in control operations.
example_evidence: Upload your board charter showing independent members.

name: Defined Roles and Responsibilities
description: Management has defined and documented roles and responsibilities for implementation and oversight of the risk management and compliance programs (e.g., security, privacy, AI, etc.).
example_evidence: Upload documentation showing defined roles and responsibilities for risk management and compliance programs.

name: Code of Conduct
description: Satoshi Energy Corp maintains a documented code of conduct. Eligible personnel are required to acknowledge Satoshi Energy Corp's code of conduct during onboarding and annually thereafter.
example_evidence: Upload your documented code of conduct and evidence of personnel acknowledgment during onboarding and annually.

name: Data Protection Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has a documented a policy that outlines the procedures and technical measures to be implemented at the organization to protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of data.
example_evidence: Upload your documented data protection policy.

name: Formal Screening Process
description: Management evaluates candidates for employment through a formal screening process. The process may include verification of academic and professional qualifications, identity verifications, validation of personal or professional references, technical interviews, or other steps as deemed applicable by the organization.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of the formal interview/recruitment process for a recently hired personnel. Example: Calendar invites for interviews, documented feedback notes from interviewers, evidence of evaluation of resume and professional credentials.

name: Job Descriptions
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has documented job descriptions for each position at the company, which include roles and responsibilities as well as required qualifications, skills, and experience for the role.
example_evidence: Upload documented job descriptions for personnel showing roles and responsibilities as well as required qualifications, skills, and experience. Auditors will generally look for examples of job descriptions for personnel in information security roles or that may impact the confidentiality, integrity, or availability of data.

name: Screen Lockout
description: Company-managed devices are configured to enforce a screensaver lock with after a defined period of inactivity in accordance with company policies and compliance requirements.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of screen lockout configurations on company-managed devices.

name: Password Manager
description: A password manager is installed on all company-managed devices.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing password managers are deployed on company-managed devices.

name: Antimalware Software on Devices
description: Anti-malware software is installed on all company-managed devices.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing anti-malware software is installed and configured on company-managed devices.

name: Automated Updates on Devices
description: Automated operating system (OS) updates are enabled on company-managed devices to install security patches.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing automated OS updates are configured on company-managed devices.

name: Hard-Disk Encryption
description: Hard-disk encryption is enabled on all company-managed devices.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing hard-disk encryption is enabled on company-managed devices.

name: Encryption at Rest
description: Data at rest is encrypted using strong cryptographic algorithms.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that data at rest is encrypted using strong cryptographic algorithms.

name: Encryption in Transit
description: Data in transit is encrypted using strong cryptographic algorithms.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that data in transit is encrypted using strong cryptographic algorithms (e.g., TLS/SSL).

name: Vendor Register and Agreements
description: Satoshi Energy Corp maintains a vendor/third party register that includes a complete and accurate list of vendors/third parties, relationship owners, description for each of the services provided, risk ratings, results of vendor/third party risk management activities, etc. Satoshi Energy Corp executes agreements with vendors and service providers involved in accessing, processing, storing or managing information assets that outline the responsibilities of each vendor or service provider.
example_evidence: Provide evidence of: 1. A centralized, up-to-date inventory listing all your vendors/third parties including vendor name, relationship owner, services description, and risk rating. 2. Upon request, provide evidence of an example executed agreement/contract with a vendor involved in accessing, processing, storing, or managing your information assets.

name: Vendor Compliance Monitoring
description: Satoshi Energy Corp obtains and reviews compliance reports or other evidence for critical vendors and service providers at least annually to monitor the third parties' compliance with industry frameworks, regulations, standards (e.g., SOC 2, ISO, PCI DSS, etc.) and Satoshi Energy Corp's requirements.
example_evidence: Provide documentation showing that your organization obtains and reviews compliance reports or other evidence for critical vendors at least annually. Documentation can include: SOC 2 Type 2 Reports, Completed security questionnaire, ISO 27001 certificate.

name: Privileged Access Restricted
description: Administrative or privileged access to systems, resources, and functions is restricted to authorized personnel.
example_evidence: Upload screenshots or exports of user lists showing the users with administrative or privileged access to systems (e.g., super users, administrators, power users) for relevant systems such as cloud infrastructure, code repositories, identity provider, password vault systems, VPN clients.

name: Secure Password Storage
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has implemented technical measures to protect stored user passwords for the system (e.g., encryption, hashing, salting, etc.).
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that stored secrets (e.g., user passwords, API keys) are managed securely. Examples: Screenshots showing that secrets are not stored in plain text, using encryption, hashing, or salting, using a secrets manager solution.

name: Customer Data Segregation
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has implemented segregation mechanisms so that customers cannot impact or access data or resources of other customers.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing customer data is segregated. Example: Screenshots from the database showing unique identifiers for customers, screenshots showing separate databases/storage buckets for individual customers.

name: Session Termination
description: Satoshi Energy Corp's systems automatically terminate a user's logical session based on predefined conditions (e.g., predefined periods of inactivity, closure of the system or internet browser, etc.).
example_evidence: Upload evidence of automated logoff for relevant systems/applications showing users are logged out after inactivity or browser closure.

name: Terms of Service
description: Satoshi Energy Corp maintains a publicly available terms of service for use of the system. All users must agree to the terms of service prior to using the system.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of your terms of service available online, as well as screenshots of the account sign up process showing users are required to accept the terms of service prior to using the system.

name: Commitments Communicated to Customers
description: Satoshi Energy Corp communicates service commitments and system requirements to customers and other external parties, as appropriate, through contracts, agreements, company website, etc. Satoshi Energy Corp provides notification to relevant parties of any changes to service commitments and system requirements.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of service commitments communicated to customers.

name: Public Privacy Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp maintains a publicly available privacy policy/notice.
example_evidence: Add a link to your publicly available privacy policy/notice. The privacy policy should contain information including purpose for collecting, lawful basis, types of personal information, choice and consent, methods of collection, use, retention, data subject rights, use of subprocessors, technical measures, and monitoring and enforcement.

name: Master Service Agreements
description: Master service agreements outlining specific requirements are executed with enterprise customers or when the standard terms of service may not apply.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of a recently executed service agreement with a customer showing specific terms.

name: Multi-Factor Authentication
description: Authentication to systems requires the use of multi-factor authentication.
example_evidence: Upload screenshots of the multi-factor authentication configurations for relevant systems. If MFA is enforced on a per-user level, upload evidence showing all users have MFA enabled.

name: Password Policy and Configuration
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has a documented policy outlining the minimum requirements for passwords used for authentication to organizational systems. Password requirements are enforced for all systems in accordance with company policy.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of the password requirements enforced for relevant systems. Example: Screenshot showing minimum password requirements for relevant systems showing complexity and minimum length requirements.

name: Access Provisioning
description: Access requests to information resources, including physical access and access to systems and data, are documented and approved by management based on least privilege, need to know, and segregation of duties principles.
example_evidence: Upload an example record of access request and approval for a user to be granted permission to a system. Example: Access request ticket with documented approval from system owner or manager.

name: Access Deprovisioning
description: System and physical access is revoked within one business day of effective termination date for terminated users (including employees, third parties and vendors, and other personnel).
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing the offboarding activities for one recently terminated personnel (e.g., offboarding checklist, IT or help desk ticket) showing that system and physical access was revoked within the timelines set forth in company policy.

name: Unique User IDs
description: Authentication to systems requires the use of unique identities.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing unique user IDs are enforced for system authentication.

name: Root Access Control
description: Root password authentication to production resources (e.g., virtual machines, containers, etc.) is disabled and only allowed for under exceptional circumstances for a limited time duration based on documented business justification and approval from management.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that root password authentication to production resources is disabled. Example: Screenshots of infrastructure as code configurations showing that password login has been disabled for root.

name: Access to Remote Server Administration Ports Restricted
description: Network security controls are in place to restrict public access to remote server administration ports (e.g., SSH, RDP) to authorized IP addresses or address ranges only.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of network security configurations restricting access to remote server administration ports.

name: Communication of System Changes
description: Satoshi Energy Corp communicates system changes via release notes or change log in the company's website or via periodic communications.
example_evidence: Upload examples of communication of system changes to customers (e.g., release notes, change log, communications sent out to customers via email).

name: Restricted Public Access
description: Cloud resources are configured to deny public access.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing cloud resources are configured to deny public access.

name: Critical Change Management
description: Emergency changes or hot fixes implemented outside of the standard change management process are reviewed and approved by an authorized individual after implementation.
example_evidence: For a hot fix or emergency change, upload evidence showing that the change followed the standard change management process or was reviewed and approved by an authorized individual after implementation. Example: Screenshots or exports of pull requests/merge requests showing change control, documentation such as emails showing post-implementation review and approval.

name: Data Backups
description: Backups of production data are performed at least daily and are configured to be retained in accordance with the retention periods established in company policies and procedures.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing back-up and retention configurations for production databases (e.g., screenshots showing backup frequency and window, retention period).

name: Storage Bucket Versioning
description: Storage buckets that contain sensitive data have versioning enabled to preserve, retrieve, and restore versions of objects.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing storage bucket versioning is enabled for sensitive data.

name: Logging System
description: Satoshi Energy Corp uses a centralized system that collects and stores logs of system activity and sends alerts to personnel based on pre-configured rules. Access to logs is restricted to authorized personnel.
example_evidence: Upload screenshots from the location where logs of system activity are stored.

name: Network Security Controls
description: Network security controls are in place to limit inbound and outbound traffic to the environment to only what is necessary based on business justification. All other traffic is specifically denied.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of network security configurations. Example: Screenshot of firewall rules, security groups (inbound/outbound rules) showing network security configurations.

name: System Monitoring
description: Production systems and resources are monitored and automated alerts are sent out personnel based on pre-configured rules. Events are triaged to determine if they constitute an incident and escalated per policy if necessary.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of system monitoring and alert configurations.

name: Threat Detection System
description: A threat detection system is in place to monitor web traffic and suspicious activity. When anomalous traffic activity is identified, alerts are automatically sent to personnel, investigated, and escalated through the incident management process, if necessary.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of threat detection system configurations and monitoring capabilities.

name: Web Application Firewall
description: A web application firewall is in place to protect public-facing web applications from outside threats.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of web application firewall (WAF) configurations (e.g., screenshots showing active WAF rulesets).

name: Root Infrastructure Account Monitored
description: Access to the root account in the cloud infrastructure provider is monitored. Login activity for the root account is investigated and validated for appropriateness.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing root account access is monitored and login activity is investigated.

name: Intrusion Detection/Prevention System
description: An intrusion detection system (IDS)/intrusion prevention system (IPS) or equivalent is in place to detect real-time suspicious or anomalous network traffic that may be indicative of threat actor activity and is configured to alert personnel when a potential intrusion is detected.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing: 1. Screenshots from AWS GuardDuty, Azure Sentinel, GCP Security Command Center or equivalent monitoring tool. 2. Screenshots showing the types of threats that would be detected. 3. Screenshots showing how personnel would be alerted when threats are detected.

name: Encrypted Remote Production Access
description: Remote access to production systems is only available through an encrypted connection (e.g., encrypted virtual private network, SSH, etc.)
example_evidence: Upload evidence that remote access to production resources is only available through an encrypted connection. Example: Screenshot showing access to production servers is not available without encrypted VPN.

name: Physical Security Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has a documented policy that outlines requirements for physical security.
example_evidence: Upload your documented physical security policy.

name: Monitoring Processing Capacity and Usage
description: Satoshi Energy Corp monitors processing capacity and use of resources continuously to manage demand and to enable the implementation of additional resources as necessary.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of processing capacity monitoring (e.g., screenshots from observability tools showing dashboards for utilization metrics, screenshot of alert configurations).

name: Load Balancer
description: Satoshi Energy Corp uses a load balancer to automatically distribute incoming traffic across multiple targets.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing a load balancer is configured to distribute traffic across multiple targets.

name: Autoscaling
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has enabled auto-scaling configurations to provision new cloud resources when predefined capacity thresholds are met.
example_evidence: Upload screenshot of auto scaling configurations for cloud resources.

name: Backup Monitoring
description: Automated notifications are sent to personnel in the event of a backup failure. Backup failures are investigated and resolved by engineering personnel following company policies and procedures.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of: 1. Automated configurations from the backup service for notifying personnel when backup processes fail. 2. Example email for a failed backup and ticket documenting resolution.

name: Backup Restore Testing
description: Satoshi Energy Corp tests the integrity and recoverability of backed-up data at least annually.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of your most recent test restore of backed-up data completed within the past year. Example: Documentation of the backup restoration process showing steps taken and associated evidence, results, and date completed.

name: Data Retention Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has a documented and implemented a policy for data retention defining the types of data (including company and customer data) and the period of time for which they should be retained.
example_evidence: Upload your documented data retention policy.

name: Data Classification Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has established a data classification policy in order to identify the types of information stored or processed by the organization and the protection measures that are required for each.
example_evidence: Upload your documented data classification policy.

name: Customer Data Deletion Upon Termination
description: Satoshi Energy Corp disposes of customer data upon termination of services in accordance with contractual agreements.
example_evidence: For a recently churned customer, upload evidence showing that customer data disposal was conducted. Example: Screenshots of logs showing data was disposed of, screenshots from production resources showing customer-specific resources were decommissioned.

name: Test Data
description: Test data is used in testing and development environments to prevent sensitive information from being copied to non-production environments.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that production data is not used in testing environments. Example: Screenshots from testing databases showing mock data is used, data anonymization or mock data generation scripts.

name: Personnel Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDA)
description: Personnel, including employees and contractors, are required to sign an agreement that outlines confidentiality requirements (e.g., non-disclosure agreements) prior to hire.
example_evidence: Upload an example executed agreement addressing confidentiality with a recently hired employee (e.g., NDA, PIIA, employment agreement including confidentiality clauses).

name: Disposal of Sensitive Data on Paper
description: When Satoshi Energy Corp disposes of hard copy materials, it does so through secure means such as cross-cut shredding, incinerating, or pulping, so that sensitive data cannot be reconstructed.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of: 1. Observation of hard copy material being disposed (can be performed by auditors on-site or via virtual meeting).

name: Secure Storage Mechanisms
description: Satoshi Energy Corp uses secure storage mechanisms for digital media and hardcopy materials that contain sensitive data (e.g., locked codes, combination locks to offices, rooms and facilities such as key cabinets, etc.) as well as critical equipment and other assets. Access to the secured storage mechanisms (including access to physical keys and knowledge of authentication information) is restricted to authorized personnel.
example_evidence: Upload pictures of secure storage bins from office locations.

name: Disposal of Sensitive Data on Hardware
description: Satoshi Energy Corp disposes of data on hardware through secure means, such as wiping and hard drive destruction, in accordance with documented policies and procedures.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of one instance of data disposal on hardware showing that data was disposed securely. Examples: Certificate of destruction of hardware, screenshots showing hard drive data on an endpoint were wiped prior to reuse.

name: Acceptable Input Ranges
description: Satoshi Energy Corp's has implemented automated edit checks in the system to limit input to defined value ranges and formats.
example_evidence: Upload screenshots of users entering data into the application confirming that the application limits input values to only valid values.

name: Mandatory Fields
description: Automated application checks are in place that require mandatory fields to be complete before data entry is accepted.
example_evidence: Upload screenshots of user entering data into the application confirming that the application requires mandatory data to be entered.

name: Notice and Acknowledgement of Privacy Practices
description: Satoshi Energy Corp provides notice of its privacy practices to users prior to accessing the system. Users are required to explicitly acknowledge the privacy policy prior to entering information into the system.
example_evidence: Upload screenshots of the account sign up process showing users are required to accept the privacy policy prior to using the system.

name: Privacy Policy Content
description: Satoshi Energy Corp's documented Privacy Policy includes information on purpose for collecting/processing personal information, lawful basis, types of personal information collected, choice and consent, methods of collection, use, retention, and disposal, data subject rights, use of subprocessors, technical and organizational measures, quality, and monitoring and enforcement.
example_evidence: Upload your documented privacy policy that includes all required components or link to your publicly available privacy policy/notice.

name: Periodic Review of Privacy Policy
description: Satoshi Energy Corp's management reviews the online privacy policy and/or notice at least annually to validate its continued suitability and accuracy. The online privacy policy/notice includes the date it was last updated. Satoshi Energy Corp notifies customers of changes to the privacy notice and the nature of the changes, including when personal information will be used for new purposes not previously identified.
example_evidence: Upload evidence of the most review of the online privacy policy/notice to show the policy has been reviewed within the past year. Example: Records of emails, meeting minutes, draft versions showing reviews and updates to the policy. For any recent changes, upload evidence showing customers were notified.

name: Requests for Deletion of PII
description: Satoshi Energy Corp complies with legitimate requests to delete PII from data subjects by permanently and completely erasing the personal information from its existing systems or de-identifying the personal information within the timelines established by regulatory requirements.
example_evidence: For an example personal information deletion request from a data subject, upload evidence showing that the request was fulfilled within regulatory timelines and confirmation was provided to the data subject.

name: Procedures for Information Disposal
description: Satoshi Energy Corp has documented policies and procedures for erasure or destruction of information that has been identified for disposal.
example_evidence: Upload your documented procedures for erasure or destruction of information that has been identified for disposal.

name: Personal Information Accessible Through System Authentication
description: Satoshi Energy Corp provides a mechanism for users to view, correct, and/or delete their personal information by authenticating into the system with a username and password and navigating to their profile settings.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that system users can view, correct, and/or delete their personal information. Example: Screenshots from the system interface showing that users have the ability to view and edit their personal information from their account profile.

name: Privacy Requirements Communicated to Third parties
description: Satoshi Energy Corp's privacy policies or other specific instructions for handling personal information, including requirements and procedures to notify Satoshi Energy Corp of breaches or unauthorized disclosures, are communicated to third parties to whom personal information is disclosed.
example_evidence: Upload your organization's vendor agreement template or an example executed agreement showing that specific instructions for handling personal information are communicated to third parties.

name: Documentation of Breaches or Unauthorized Disclosures of PII
description: Satoshi Energy Corp maintains documentation of any personal data breaches or unauthorized disclosures of PII including the facts relating to the personal data breach or disclosure, its effects and impact, and the remedial action taken.
example_evidence: For any personal data breaches or unauthorized disclosures, upload evidence showing that documentation is retained including the facts relating to the breach, its effects and impact, and the remedial action taken.

name: Privacy and Security Requirements in Third-Party Agreements
description: Satoshi Energy Corp shares information with vendors and third parties only when an executed agreement (e.g., service agreements, business associate agreements, data processing agreements, etc.) is in place that includes security, confidentiality, and privacy requirements for the transfer and processing of information.
example_evidence: Upload an example executed agreement with a vendor or third party showing that security, confidentiality, and privacy requirements are included.

name: Notification of Incidents or Breaches
description: Satoshi Energy Corp provides communications about breaches and incidents to affected parties, organizational officials, authorities, and other internal and external stakeholders, in accordance with company policies and procedures and contractual and legal obligations.
example_evidence: For one example security incident or breach, upload evidence showing that notification of the incident or breach was given to affected parties and authorities in accordance with policies and legal obligations.

name: Use of Subprocessors Communicated
description: Satoshi Energy Corp communicates to customers any use of subprocessors to process PII (e.g., through a list of subprocessors in the company website or data processing agreement, etc.). Satoshi Energy Corp obtains authorization from customers for the use of subprocessors (e.g., through executed data processing agreements, accepting the terms in the website, etc.).
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that the subprocessors used to process PII are communicated to customers (e.g., screenshots a list of subprocessors posted on the company website, template data processing agreement).

name: Point of Contact for Privacy Inquiries
description: Satoshi Energy Corp provides a contact mechanism for data subjects to submit privacy-related requests or report privacy incidents (e.g., email address, customer portal, etc.).
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that the organization provides a contact mechanism for data subjects to submit privacy-related requests (e.g., email address for privacy inquiries communicated via agreements or through the company website).

name: Privacy Inquiries Tracked
description: Satoshi Energy Corp maintains records of privacy rights requests in ticket or log format that includes the date of request, nature of request, manner in which the request was made, the date of the business's response, the nature of the response, and the basis for the denial of the request if the request is denied in whole or in part.
example_evidence: Upload evidence showing that privacy right requests are tracked internally. Example: Screenshot of the tracking system where privacy right requests are logged, documentation for an example request.

name: Board Charter Documented
description: The company's board of directors has a documented charter that outlines its oversight responsibilities for internal control.
example_evidence: Upload the current board of directors charter outlining board membership and responsibilities (e.g., committees, if applicable).

name: Board Meetings
description: The company's board of directors, owners, senior leadership, or equivalent body, meets at least annually with management to review company performance, strategic objectives, compliance initiatives, and security and privacy risk and mitigation strategies. Meeting minutes, including decisions made and action items, are documented.
example_evidence: Upload the meeting agenda and minutes for the most recent board of directors meeting, showing date, participants, topics discussed, etc. Consider reporting cybersecurity and compliance matters to the board.
